statements: SELECT * FROM ar_vr_training_simulations;
SELECT id, scenario_name, difficulty_level FROM ar_vr_training_simulations;
SELECT scenario_name, duration_minutes FROM ar_vr_training_simulations WHERE difficulty_level='Advanced';
SELECT id, scenario_description FROM ar_vr_training_simulations WHERE duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT scenario_name, difficulty_level FROM ar_vr_training_simulations ORDER BY difficulty_level DESC, scenario_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ar_vr_training_simulations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT scenario_name, difficulty_level FROM ar_vr_training_simulations WHERE duration_minutes > 30 ORDER BY scenario_name ASC;
SELECT scenario_description FROM ar_vr_training_simulations WHERE duration_minutes BETWEEN 20 AND 40 AND difficulty_level = 'Beginner';
SELECT id, scenario_name, difficulty_level FROM ar_vr_training_simulations WHERE difficulty_level = 'Advanced' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ar_vr_training_simulations WHERE scenario_name LIKE '%tree%' AND duration_minutes < 60;
SELECT * FROM Scenario;
SELECT scenario_name, scenario_description FROM Scenario WHERE scenario_id = 1;
SELECT scenario_name FROM Scenario WHERE scenario_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM Simulation WHERE simulation_duration > 100;
SELECT * FROM Simulation ORDER BY simulation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Scenario WHERE scenario_id = 1;
SELECT scenario_name, scenario_description FROM Scenario ORDER BY scenario_name ASC;
SELECT scenario_id, COUNT(*) AS total_simulations FROM Simulation GROUP BY scenario_id HAVING total_simulations > 5;
SELECT * FROM Scenario INNER JOIN Simulation ON Scenario.scenario_id = Simulation.scenario_id;

SELECT scenario_name, JSON_EXTRACT(simulation_results, '$.max_value') AS max_simulation_result FROM Scenario INNER JOIN Simulation ON Scenario.scenario_id = Simulation.scenario_id WHERE simulation_results IS NOT NULL ORDER BY max_simulation_result DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_scenarios;
SELECT scenario_name, scenario_description FROM training_scenarios ORDER BY scenario_difficulty DESC;
SELECT * FROM scenario_steps WHERE step_duration > 10;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM scenario_assets WHERE step_id = 1;
SELECT scenario_name, scenario_difficulty FROM training_scenarios WHERE scenario_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM training_scenarios WHERE scenario_difficulty > 3;
SELECT scenario_name, scenario_description FROM training_scenarios WHERE scenario_id < 5;
SELECT scenario_name, step_description FROM training_scenarios JOIN scenario_steps ON training_scenarios.scenario_id = scenario_steps.scenario_id;
SELECT MAX(step_duration) AS max_duration FROM scenario_steps;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM scenario_assets WHERE asset_type = 'video' ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM training_scenarios;
SELECT scenario_name, scenario_description FROM training_scenarios WHERE scenario_duration > '1 day';
SELECT user_id, progress_status FROM user_progress WHERE progress_status = 'completed';
SELECT user_id, completion_status, completion_time FROM user_performance ORDER BY completion_time DESC;
SELECT s.scenario_name, p.progress_status FROM training_scenarios s INNER JOIN user_progress p ON s.scenario_id = p.scenario_id;
SELECT * FROM training_scenarios;
SELECT scenario_id, scenario_name, scenario_duration FROM training_scenarios WHERE scenario_name='Scenario A';
SELECT s.scenario_name, ss.step_description, ss.step_duration FROM training_scenarios s JOIN scenario_steps ss ON s.scenario_id = ss.scenario_id;

SELECT u.user_id, s.scenario_name, ss.step_description, up.progress_status FROM user_progress up JOIN training_scenarios s ON up.scenario_id = s.scenario_id JOIN scenario_steps ss ON up.step_id = ss.step_id;
SELECT u.user_id, u.completion_status, up.progress_status, sp.completion_time FROM user_performance sp JOIN user_progress up ON sp.user_id = up.user_id JOIN user_progress u ON sp.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT * FROM simulation;
SELECT simulation_name, description FROM simulation WHERE duration_minutes > 60;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_account WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT scenario_name, difficulty_level FROM scenario ORDER BY scenario_name DESC;
SELECT simulation_id, COUNT(scenario_id) AS num_scenarios FROM simulation_scenario_mapping GROUP BY simulation_id;
SELECT * FROM simulation;
SELECT simulation_name, duration_minutes FROM simulation ORDER BY duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT * FROM scenario WHERE difficulty_level = 'Beginner';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_account ORDER BY username ASC;

SELECT simulation_name, description, scenario_name FROM simulation JOIN simulation_scenario_mapping ON simulation.simulation_id = simulation_scenario_mapping.simulation_id JOIN scenario ON simulation_scenario_mapping.scenario_id = scenario.scenario_id;
